casebody.data:
In re Resignation of Potter. In re Potter. Toledo Bar Association v. Potter.

[Cite as In re Resignation of Potter (1990), 49 Ohio St. 3d 607.]

(Nos. 90-264, 89-1952 and 89-2173 Submitted February 21, 1990 Decided March 7, 1990.

The resignation of Robert J. Potter as an attorney is accepted. In view of Potter’s resignation from the practice of law, case No. 89-2173 is dismissed as moot, and the indefinite suspension imposed pursuant to Gov. Bar R. V(9)(a)(iii) is vacated. (See 47 Ohio St. 3d 709, 548 N.E. 2d 244.) The costs of these cases are taxed against Potter.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Re snick, JJ., concur.
